text:
Hi All. I'm using the "Listings pagination" snippet  from <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/templates/blog#listing-pagination>
But it seems to be generating broken links. Any idea how to prevent this?

Hey there looks like our boilerplate changed and we missed an update to the linked example on that page.

Here’s an example of a pagination module you can reference

<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/main/src/modules/blog-pagination.module/module.html>

If you’re building from the boilerplate, it’s already in your modules folder.
